name: Grapefruit Sangrita With Chipotle and Honey
description: Smoke and spice add depth to bitter grapefruit in this complex sangrita, the ideal sipping partner for a good tequila.
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces (60ml) fresh juice from 1 red grapefruit

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine grapefruit juice, lime juice, honey, and chipotle chili powder and stir until honey is thoroughly combined. Season very lightly with salt, then taste and adjust any ingredients as desired. Chill in the refrigerator or by stirring with ice briefly and then straining. Serve in a shot glass alongside a good-quality silver tequila.
